## Checklist

- [ ] `fixup!` commits have been squashed
- [ ] CI passes after rebase
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated with summary of features or fixes, following [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/) guidelines
